Description: Papyrus fragment with 5 lines of Coptic text written along the fibres and 2 lines against the fibres. Mounted with 10128, 10131-3, 10136-9.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380881) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380881)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
